```{r instantiating pq_numbers}
pq_one = pq_class(1, 3, 4, 1:8)
pq_two = pq_class(1, 6, 0, nums = c(3, 9, 5, 1, 4, 1, 3))
pq_tre = pq_class(-1, 5, 1, nums = c(2, 8, 2, 8, 1, 7, 2))
```

```{r printing}
c(print(pq_one, DEC=TRUE), print(pq_two, DEC=TRUE), print(pq_tre, DEC=TRUE))
```
